General.Name: Chengdu Lihang Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Chengdu Lihang Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the production, maintenance, and support of aircraft in China. The company offers aircraft ground support equipment, aircraft testing and testing equipment, aircraft process equipment, and aircraft parts processing and assembly components. It also provides bomb hanging vehicles, engine installation vehicles, engine transport vehicles, APU installation vehicles, aircraft pylons, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Chengdu, China.

1.Name: Linjun  Wan
1.Title: Director, Deputy Gen. Mang. and Board Sec.
